messages: b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (10:44): wow is no need to show the world the phpinfo() output if there's no need to
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (10:44): How do I unstall html?
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (10:45): fajita: yum remove html
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (10:45): imMute: I give up.
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (10:45): ok... stupid question again.... what avenue can i use to change the gID of apache? I seem to have only FTP and DirectAdmin to access my server
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (10:46): fatyandao: um is this a hosted solution?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (10:47): fatyandao: if you don't have access to the confs, then you're SOL
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (10:47): So Out of Luck
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (10:47): fatyandao: basically ask customer support
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (10:47): lol.... what acronym is that?
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (10:47): So Out of Luck
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (10:47): fatyandao: an american one :)
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (10:47): FUBAR?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (10:47): it's so wrong as well
d4a7b2dda95cf54d40c6927a40bcb8d9 (10:47): hehhehe
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (10:47): so out of luck? no one in america says that...
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (10:47): fajita: FUBAR is Fsked Up Beyond All Repair
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (10:47): imMute: Okay.
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (10:48): megaspaz: this is #apache, it had to be kid and grandmother strict
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (10:48): kid_and_grandmother_strict--
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:01): is it possible to do the configure the gID of the program there?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:02): maybe with suphp, but you still need to get it installed and what not...
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:02): but you can't set User or Group for apache in htaccess...
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (11:02): php script is 10 lines, and no headers :/
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:02): php should run as the apache user or group as it is...
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (11:03): mambo is a cms
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (11:03): i know that is is possible to do by using mod_rewrite
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:03): fajita no, i know that is <reply>
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (11:03): megaspaz: Okay.
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:04): why is mambo running as a different user as apache?
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:05): that's what exactly i'm talking about
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:05): the php scripts run under the uID apache, gID apache
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:05): so why is there a discrepency with the uid and gid?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:05): ok... that makes sense
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:05): and then what's the issue?
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:05): but I uploaded the scripts and its respective files under my own username
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:05): so unless i change the file permissions to 777
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (11:06): fatyandao: httpd has already switched to its User and Group by the time your php executes
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (11:06): so its too late to switch to your own user
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (11:06): ( unless you use the suid-root suphp 0
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:06): my scripts can't access the directories and files I uploaded
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:07): sounds like an issue with your default umask on your host
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:08): afaik, creating files and dirs by default should set the default perms to 644 or 755(775) which would be accessible to all...
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:08): that is unless the admin has used very strict umask...
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:09): either way, sounds like a call to customer service
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:09): unless you can set the permissions of your directory and files
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:09): so how can i remedy the situation i have here without explicitly changing file permissions on all my files?
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:09): but only file access permissions
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:10): is all your uploads in one upload directory?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:10): and do you have shell access to your host?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:11): you're pretty screwed then
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:11): my customer service kind of sucks
e1a6f8fa11b9d9fa0f354c30f2743fc3 (11:12): your service sucks :P
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:12): well you can do some changes with ftp, but that's going to be painful fixing your permissions
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:13): but you need at least be able to chgrp the main uploads directory
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:13): and chmod as well
4df9353b19f403417a418a82e5472ee0 (11:13): with FTp i can do that?
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:13): but yeah, your service sucks
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:13): fatyandao: ftp can do chmod
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:14): i don't know about chgrp or chown
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:14): nope... no chgrp support with ftp...
e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (11:15): fatyandao: the best you can do is chmod if ftp is the only access you have...
